EmailTemplate.description: template used for Sales to send emails to customers
EmailTemplate.name: Send Email-Sales
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions - Putting all the Pieces Together!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Sincerely, !User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone} 6405 Metcalf Ave, Suite 400 Overland Park, KS 66202
Take a look at the link below, it is a full line card of what
VinSolutions can do for you.
http://www.vinsolutions.com/products.aspx
Go to this link http://vinsolutions.ning.com/
to sign up for Vinsolutions user community to blog and also get
some great marketing ideas.
